column6:
World War II. America needs a super soldier. Only one man possesses the formula to create the perfect fighting machine from volunteer Steve Rogers. But when a deadly bullet kills Dr. Erskine along with his bodyguard, M.P. Ben Parker, Steve's destiny-and that of the Marvel Universe-is changed forever. ,2006,11
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tommy Lee Edwards | writer:Stan Lee | letterer:John Workman
